title: Calories in Keyword
meta_description: Discover calories in Keyword, including protein, carbs, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving for quick reference.
assumptions: Standard serving of Keyword, prepared plainly without added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Keyword contains about 100 kcal and balanced macros.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Keyword?
What is the protein content in Keyword?
faqs.a: About 5 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: Does Keyword have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Around 150 mg per serving, which is moderate.
Yes, 15 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: How does preparation affect calories in Keyword?
faqs.a: Frying adds calories; baking or steaming reduces them.
